## JSDoc

JS doc is use for JavaScript Code documentation.

## initiate and work with jsdoc
* ```npm init -y```
* create a jsdoc.json configuration file
* add a npm script command 
```json
"scripts": {
    "doc": "jsdoc -c jsdoc.json"
}
```
* run command ```npm run doc```
* it will create docs folder where have auto generated documentation for our project

## Helpful repo
[Brad JsDoc Repo](https://github.com/bradtraversy/jsdoc-examples)
